snippet: A review conducted last year of the Washington Monument found that it had not sunk into the ground after an earthquake in 2011, but surveyors want to make sure it is still the same height.
abstract: Review conducted in 2012 of the Washington Monument found that it had not sunk into the ground after an earthquake in 2011, but surveyors are checking to make sure it is still the same height.
lead_paragraph: A review conducted last year of the Washington Monument found that it had not sunk into the ground after an earthquake in 2011, but surveyors want to make sure it is still the same height.
